ingredients.item: ½ essential Waitrose Pointed Spring Cabbage, sliced
400g can essential Waitrose Cannellini Beans, drained and rinsed

instructions.step: Place the stock in a saucepan and bring to the boil. Add the cabbage, carrot and beans, cover and simmer for 5 minutes, season.
Stir in the chives and serve with crusty bread.
